CP1M.description: Charge pump–Negative terminal of the flying capacitor C_P1.
CP1M.name: CP1M

CP1P.description: Charge pump–Positive terminal of the flying capacitor C_P1.
CP1P.name: CP1P

CP2M.description: Charge pump–Negative terminal of the flying capacitor C_P2.
CP2M.name: CP2M

CP2P.description: Charge pump–Positive terminal of the flying capacitor C_P2.
CP2P.name: CP2P

CSN.description: Chip select not (active low) for SPI communication. It is the selection pin of the device. CMOS compatible input.
CSN.name: CSN

DIAG.description: Open-drain logic output. Diagnostic feedback. DIAG = '0' if (SR1.WAKEUPM = '1') or (GSB.DIAGS = '1') or (GSB.DE = '1') else '1'
DIAG.name: DIAG

GND.description: Ground connection. TAB connection must be to ground. TAB is not intended as device reference ground (dedicated pin shall be used).
GND.name: GND

HS_GATE.description: Output of the gate driver for the external FET. Gate-On voltage (Vgs): min 6V (at Vs=6V), 12V-15V (at Vs>10V). Gate-Off voltage (Vgs): max 0.5V. Max gate voltage (Vgs): 20V.
HS_GATE.name: HS_GATE

HWLO.description: Active high input pin compatible with 3.3 V and 5 V CMOS; it causes transitions to states where the registers are locked from writing.
HWLO.name: HWLO

ISNS_N.description: Current sense amplifier negative input. Common mode input voltage range: 0V to 70V. Input current: 560 uA (typ).
ISNS_N.name: ISNS_N

ISNS_P.description: Current sense amplifier positive input. Common mode input voltage range: 0V to 70V. Differential input voltage FSR: 0 to 160 mV. Input current: 400 uA (typ).
ISNS_P.name: ISNS_P

NTC.description: Positive input pin for external NTC resistor. Senses voltage proportional to NTC resistance. Input Voltage Full Scale Range: VSENSE_N - 1.2 V to VSENSE_N V. Accuracy +/- 3mV.
NTC.name: NTC

NTC_M.description: Negative input pin for external NTC resistor. Outputs bias voltage for NTC bridge (V_SENSE_N - 1.2V nom).
NTC_M.name: NTC_M

OUT.description: External FET source connection. Senses FET source voltage for VDS monitoring and ADC. Also connected internally to bypass switch output.
OUT.name: OUT

SCK.description: Serial clock for SPI communication. It is a CMOS compatible input.
SCK.name: SCK

SDI.description: Serial data input for SPI communication. Data is transferred serially into the device on the SCK rising edge.
SDI.name: SDI

SDO.description: Serial data output for SPI communication. Data is transferred serially out of the device on the SCK falling edge.
SDO.name: SDO

TEST1.description: Test mode pin 1- must be connected to the ground.
TEST1.name: TEST1

TEST2.description: Test mode pin 2- must be connected to the ground.
TEST2.name: TEST2

V3V3.description: Output of the 3.3 V internal LDO voltage regulator (logic and I/O supply). Connect a low ESR capacitor (1 uF) close to this pin.
V3V3.name: V3V3

VS.description: Input supply pin. Connect to the 12 V, 24 V, 48 V battery voltage. Extended operating voltage up to 70V (100ms max). Undervoltage shutdown < 4.5V, reset > 6V. POR threshold ~2.4V.
VS.name: VS

VSPI.description: DC supply input for the SPI interface. 3.3 V and 5 V compatible.
VSPI.name: VSPI

fields.description: Unused
fields.name: Reserved

fields.description: GOSTBY can be set to 1 only if UNLOCK = 1; trying to set this bit to 1 when UNLOCK = 0 will have no effects and it maintains its previous value. GOSTBY can be reset to 0 also when UNLOCK = 0. To send a GOToStandby sequence it is necessary to send two consecutive SPI frames, as follows: 1st SPI writes operation to set UNLOCK bit to 1 2nd SPI write operation to set GOSTBY bit to 1 and EN bit to 0. A transition to standby state causes GOSTBY to be reset to 0.
fields.name: GOSTBY

fields.description: EN can be set to 1 only if UNLOCK = 1; trying to set this bit to 1 when UNLOCK = 0 will have no effects and it maintains its previous value. EN can be reset to 0 also when UNLOCK = 0. To send a GOToUnlocked sequence it is necessary to send two consecutive SPI frames as follows: 1st SPI writes operation to set UNLOCK bit to 1 2nd SPI write operation to set GOSTBY bit to 0 and EN bit to 1. A transition to unlocked state causes EN to be set to 1. A transition to locked state causes EN to be reset to 0.
fields.name: EN

fields.description: When it is set to 1, starts selected self-test. If current state is unlocked and S_T_CFG is not 000, then setting this bit causes a transition to self-test state. This bit is automatically reset.
fields.name: S_T_START

fields.description: When it is set to 1, stops execution of selected self-test. This bit is automatically reset.
fields.name: S_T_STOP

fields.description: Self-test selection

digital_physical_map.7: 111: Current sense + VDS detection + power switch stuck-on

fields.name: S_T_CFG

fields.description: Enables high-side through SPI 1: HS gate driver commanded on 0: HS gate driver commanded off
fields.name: OUTCTL

fields.description: Enables low current bypass through SPI 1: LCB commanded on 0: LCB commanded off
fields.name: BYPASSCTL

fields.description: Unused
fields.name: Reserved

fields.description: Mirror of WD_TRIG bit in CR3
fields.name: WD_TRIG_MIRROR_CR1

fields.description: Odd parity bit check for CR1
fields.name: PARITY_CR1

fields.description: Configures the value of nominal time, required for the fuse emulation. Nominal time corresponds to the trip time obtained when current is equal to the nominal overcurrent threshold (OVC_THR). Equation: t_NOM (s) = T_NOM_digital + 1
fields.name: T_NOM

fields.description: Configures the value of nominal overcurrent threshold.
fields.name: OVC_THR

fields.description: Configures a threshold for hard short circuit latch-off.
fields.name: HSHT_THR

fields.description: Configures a threshold for external MOSFET desaturation shutdown. Configuration 0x1F is reserved. Equation: V_DS_THR (mV) = 300 + VDS_THR_digital * 50
fields.name: VDS_THR

fields.description: Mirror of WD_TRIG bit in CR3
fields.name: WD_TRIG_MIRROR_CR2

fields.description: Odd parity bit check for CR2
fields.name: PARITY_CR2

fields.description: Unused
fields.name: Reserved

fields.description: 0: bits GOSTBY, EN cannot be set to 1 but can be reset; 1: bits GOSTBY, EN can be set to 1, but only with the next valid SPI frame. When UNLOCK = 1, it is automatically reset with the next valid SPI frame.
fields.name: UNLOCK

fields.description: Configures a threshold for external MOSFET overtemperature shutdown via NTC.
fields.name: NTC_THR

fields.description: Watchdog time selection
fields.name: WD_TIME

fields.description: Outputs status in locked state: 0: leave output and bypass as they are (default) 1: shut off output and bypass
fields.name: DIS_OUT_MODE

fields.description: In order to keep device in unlocked mode, this bit must be cyclically toggled within a period equal to tWD to refresh the watchdog.
fields.name: WD_TRIG

fields.description: Odd parity bit check for CR3
fields.name: PARITY_CR3

fields.description: Unused
fields.name: Reserved

fields.description: Disable output fault: a transition to locked mode state causes this bit to be set to 1, but only when DIS_OUT_MODE = 1. When DIS_OUT_FAULT = 1, both high-side and bypass are switched off. Access: R/C
fields.name: DIS_OUT_FAULT

fields.description: Self-test state flag bit. Access: R
fields.name: SELFTEST

fields.description: High-side gate driver status bit 1: HS gate driver turned on 0: HS gate driver turned off. Access: R
fields.name: OUTST

fields.description: Low current bypass status bit 1: LCB turned on 0: LCB turned off. Access: R
fields.name: BYPASS_ST

fields.description: Wake up mode flag bit. Access: R
fields.name: WAKEUPM

fields.description: Locked mode flag bit. Access: R
fields.name: LOCKEDM

fields.description: HWLO mirror bit: provides the logical level of HWLO pin after having applied a symmetrical filter on both its rising and falling edges (filtering time is tHWLO). Access: R
fields.name: HWLO_ST

fields.description: VS undervoltage 'real-time' bit 0: VS > VS_USD + VS_USD_HYS 1: VS <= VS_USD if the battery supply voltage VS falls below the undervoltage shutdown threshold, then the external MOSFET, the charge pump and the bypass switch are switched off. Access: R
fields.name: VS_UV

fields.description: Hard short circuit latch-off: a hard short circuit shutdown of the MOSFET (HSHT = 1) and the bypass switch occurs when the current sense voltage exceeds the preset threshold. The MOSFET and the bypass switch are re-armed via SPI. Access: R/C
fields.name: HSHT

fields.description: External MOSFET desaturation shutdown: a desaturation shutdown of the MOSFET (VDS_MAX = 1) and the bypass switch occurs if the VDS exceeds the preset threshold when HS is in on-state after VDS_DEGLITCH time. The MOSFET and the bypass switch are re-armed via SPI. Access: R/C
fields.name: VDS_MAX

fields.description: Low current bypass desaturation shutdown: a desaturation shutdown of the Low current bypass (BYPASS_SAT = 1) occurs if the VDS exceeds the fixed threshold when HS is in off-state and bypass is in on-state. When BYPASS_SAT = 1, external MOSFET is automatically commanded on, independently of OUTCTL bit value. The Low current bypass is rearmed via SPI. A transition to wake-up mode causes this bit to be set to 1. Access: R/C
fields.name: BYPASS_SAT

fields.description: Current vs time latch-off: an overcurrent shutdown of the MOSFET (FUSE_LATCH = 1) and the bypass switch occurs when the current sense voltage exceeds the preset threshold for longer than the preset time (I2-t curve emulating a traditional fuse). The MOSFET and bypass switch are rearmed via SPI. Access: R/C
fields.name: FUSE_LATCH

fields.description: Overcurrent warning: an overcurrent warning (OVC = 1) occurs even when average current sense value evaluated in a time interval equal to tI_SAMPLING (time basis used by fuse emulation algorithm) exceeds current threshold programmed through OVC_THR. This is a 'real-time' bit OVC bit keeps memory of the previous events: once this bit is set, it will be reset automatically after a time depending on current level previously reached and on the related timings. Moreover, after a FUSE_LATCH bit setting, OVC will be automatically reset in a time interval proportional to the TNOM value previously programmed (provided that in the meantime FUSE_LATCH is not cleared, high-side restarts and current is again above OVC_THR). Resetting FUSE_LATCH bit when OVC bit is still set to 1 is possible, but in this case user can expect that trip time will be lower than expected. Access: R
fields.name: OVC

fields.description: Overtemperature shutdown ('real-time' bit). When DEV_OVT = 1, the MOSFET, the charge pump and the bypass switch are turned off. Access: R
fields.name: DEV_OVT

fields.description: External MOS overtemperature: this bit is latched when NTC is lower than NTC_THR. When NTC_OVT = 1 both external MOS and bypass switch are turned off. The MOSFET and the bypass switch are rearmed via SPI. Access: R/C
fields.name: NTC_OVT

fields.description: This bit is set in on-state when VGS falls below UV threshold (VGS_UVLO_10V) for more than VG_UVLO_DEGLITCH. When this bit is set, external FET is switched off. Access: R/C
fields.name: VGS_LOW

fields.description: This bit is set when VCP falls below VCP_LOW threshold for more than tCP_RISE. When this bit is set, external FET driver is disabled. This is a 'real-time' bit. Access: R
fields.name: CP_LOW

fields.description: Watchdog failure bit: 0: Watchdog OK; 1: Watchdog failure in unlocked / self-test states When this bit is set, device goes to locked state. To go back to the unlocked mode through the GoToUnlocked sequence this bit must be cleared. Access: R/C
fields.name: WD_FAIL

fields.description: Odd parity bit check for SR1. Access: R
fields.name: PARITY_SR1

fields.description: Unused
fields.name: Reserved

fields.description: 13 bit ADC conversion related to current sense amplifier, ranging from 0 V to 160 mV; unidirectional current through an external sense resistor. Equation: V_SENSE (mV) = CURR_SENSE_digital * 160 / 8192. Access: R
fields.name: CURR_SENSE

fields.description: Updated status bit. This bit is set when value is updated and cleared when register is read. Access: R
fields.name: UPDT_CURR

fields.description: Odd parity bit check for SR2. Access: R
fields.name: PARITY_SR2

fields.description: Unused
fields.name: Reserved

fields.description: 10 bit ADC conversion related to TJ (device temperature). Equation: T_J (°C) = (TJ_digital / 3) - 72. Access: R
fields.name: TJ

fields.description: Updated status bit. This bit is set when value is updated and cleared when register is read. Access: R
fields.name: UPDT_TJ

fields.description: 10 bit ADC conversion related to NTC (external MOSFET temperature sensing through an external NTC resistor). Equation: V_NTC (V) = V_SENSE_N - (NTC_digital * 1.2 / 1024). Access: R
fields.name: NTC

fields.description: Updated status bit. This bit is set when value is updated and cleared when register is read. Access: R
fields.name: UPDT_NTC

fields.description: Odd parity bit check for SR3. Access: R
fields.name: PARITY_SR3

fields.description: Unused
fields.name: Reserved

fields.description: 10 bit ADC conversion of the voltage across HS switch (VS-OUT). This register is not refreshed during VDS self-test execution. Equation: VDS (V) = VDS_digital * 2 / 1024. Access: R
fields.name: VDS

fields.description: Updated status bit. This bit is set when value is updated and cleared when register is read. Access: R
fields.name: UPDT_VDS

fields.description: 10 bit ADC conversion of the OUT pin. Equation: VOUT (V) = VOUT_digital * 51 * 1.2 / 1024. Access: R
fields.name: VOUT

fields.description: Updated status bit. This bit is set when value is updated and cleared when register is read. Access: R
fields.name: UPDT_VOUT

fields.description: Odd parity bit check for SR4. Access: R
fields.name: PARITY_SR4

fields.description: Unused
fields.name: Reserved

fields.description: This bit is set if VDS_THR is reached during VDS self-test. Access: R/C
fields.name: S_T_VDS_MAX1

fields.description: Difference between 10 bit ADC conversion of the VDS, performed during VDS self-test and content of VDS register latched during self-test execution. Access: R/C
fields.name: S_T_VDS

fields.description: Status of VDS self-test 00: IDLE: self-test not started 01: RUN: self-test execution in progress 10: END: self-test completed successfully (consistent data available on dedicated registers) 11: ABORT: self-test aborted (watchdog timeout, HWLO, S_T_STOP when not required). Access: R/C
fields.name: S_T_VDS_STATUS

fields.description: Odd parity bit check for SR5. Access: R
fields.name: PARITY_SR5

fields.description: Unused
fields.name: Reserved

fields.description: Updated status bit. This bit is set when value is updated and cleared when register is read. Access: R/C
fields.name: UPDT_S_T_STUCK

fields.description: This bit is set if VDS_THR is reached during STUCK ON self-test. Access: R/C
fields.name: S_T_VDS_MAX2

fields.description: 10 bit ADC conversion of the VDS, performed during STUCK ON self-test. Access: R/C
fields.name: S_T_STUCK

fields.description: Status of STUCK_ON self-test 00: IDLE: self-test not started 01: RUN: self-test execution in progress 10: END: self-test completed successfully (consistent data available on dedicated registers) 11: ABORT: self-test aborted (watchdog timeout, HWLO, S_T_STOP when not required). Access: R/C
fields.name: S_T_STUCK_STATUS

fields.description: Odd parity bit check for SR6. Access: R
fields.name: PARITY_SR6

fields.description: Unused
fields.name: Reserved

fields.description: This bit is set if HSHT_THR is reached during CURRENT SENSE self-test. Access: R/C
fields.name: S_T_HSHT

fields.description: This bit is set if OVC_THR is reached during CURRENT SENSE self-test. Access: R/C
fields.name: S_T_OVC

fields.description: Difference between 10 bit ADC conversion of the CURRENT SENSE, performed during CURRENT SENSE self-test and content of HSHT_SAR register latched during self-test execution. Access: R/C
fields.name: S_T_CURR

fields.description: Status of CURRENT SENSE self-test 00: IDLE: self-test not started 01: RUN: self-test execution in progress 10: END: self-test completed successfully (consistent data available on dedicated registers) 11: ABORT: self-test aborted (watchdog timeout, HWLO, S_T_STOP when not required). Access: R/C
fields.name: S_T_CURR_STATUS

fields.description: Odd parity bit check for SR7. Access: R
fields.name: PARITY_SR7

fields.description: Unused
fields.name: Reserved

fields.description: 10 bit ADC SAR fast conversion related to current sense amplifier, ranging from 0 V to 160 mV; unidirectional current through an external sense resistor. This register is not refreshed during current sense self-test execution. Equation: V_SENSE (mV) = HSHT_SAR_digital * 160 / 1024. Access: R
fields.name: HSHT_SAR

fields.description: Updated status bit. This bit is set when value is updated and cleared when register is read. Access: R
fields.name: UPDT_HSHT

fields.description: Odd parity bit check for SR8. Access: R
fields.name: PARITY_SR8

fields.description: STMicroelectronics company code
fields.name: CompanyCodeValue

fields.description: Product family code
fields.name: DeviceFamilyValue

fields.description: First product letter code
fields.name: ProductCode1Value

fields.description: Second product letter code
fields.name: ProductCode2Value

fields.description: Third product letter code
fields.name: ProductCode3Value

fields.description: Fourth product letter code
fields.name: ProductCode4Value

fields.description: AD silicon version
fields.name: SiliconVersionValue

fields.description: Bit7 = 0, burst read is disabled, SPI data length = 32bit Bit6, DL2 = 0 Bit5, DL1 = 1 Bit4, DL0 = 1 Bit3, SPI8 =0: 8-bit frame option not available Bit2 =0: Parity check is used Bit1, S1=0 Bit0, S0=1
fields.name: SPIModeValue

fields.description: A WD is implemented Bit7, WD1 =0 Bit6, WD0 =1 WD period 5ms = 10*ms -> WT[5:0] = 0xA Bit5, WT5 = 0 Bit4, WT4 = 0 Bit3, WT3 = 1 Bit2, WT2 = 0 Bit1, WT1 = 1 Bit0, WT0 = 0
fields.name: WDTypeValue

fields.description: Bit7,WB1 = 0 Bit6,WB2 = 1 WBA[5-0], Bit[5-0] = address of the config. register, where the WD bit is located = 03h = 000011b
fields.name: WDBitPos1Value

fields.description: Bit7,WB1 = 1 Bit6,WB0 = 1 Bit position of the WD bit within the corresponding configuration register = 01d = 000001b
fields.name: WDBitPos2Value

fields.description: Access to this address provokes a SW reset (all control registers are set to their default values; in addition, all clearable status registers are cleared too). Note: data field should not be 'all ones', otherwise an 'SDI stuck at' error occurs.
fields.name: AdvancedOpCodeValue

registers.description: Status Register 6 (SELFTEST STUCK ON). Read/Clear register.
registers.name: SR6

registers.description: Status Register 7 (SELFTEST CURRENT SENSE). Read/Clear register.
registers.name: SR7
